entry.em: ..FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT LATE SATURDAY NIGHT

entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR THIS EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
PATCHY FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PATCHY FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
PATCHY FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PATCHY FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS AROUND 70
LOWS AROUND 40

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
